author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description:
Based on the issue "Dataformat compatibility issue for HI SiStrip cluster in RAW" (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39106)

Aim : 
Changing Data-format (edmNew::DetSetVector<SiStripApproximateCluster>r) in RAW to be simple-enough for infinite backwards compatibility. -> It has to be readable by all future CMSSW releases.
Re-defining the corresponding final data-types directly in the ApproximatedClusters.
Need to be straightforward to convert from edmNew::DetSetVector

The simplified data format has updated (recommended by Matti in 2022 Sep)
(https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...makortel:cmssw:siStripApproximateClusterCollection_v2) 

Target : 13_2_X release (current working release : 13_2_0_pre2)
#### PR validation:
Tested in CMSSW_13_2_0_pre2, the basic test passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Add SiStrip ApproximateClusterCollection as a simple format for RAW
